meanings.definition: A social gathering where one or more people stay overnight at another person's house.
meanings.sent1: My friends and I had fun at the sleepovers.
meanings.sent2: I love having sleepovers with my cousins during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The sleepovers always end with us telling spooky stories.
meanings.sent4: To me, sleepovers are like mini adventures in cozy forts.
meanings.sent5: The sleepovers at Sarah's house are always full of laughter and games.

meanings.definition: The act of spending the night at someone else's house, typically for social reasons.
meanings.sent1: Sleepovers are a great way to bond with friends.
meanings.sent2: I remember having sleepovers at my best friend's place every weekend.
meanings.sent3: Last night's sleepover turned into a late-night dance party.
meanings.sent4: In a way, sleepovers feel like a slumber party from a movie.
meanings.sent5: The sleepovers at the summer camp were the highlight of the season.
